nodes.text: Jedi Padawan Jolee Bindo possessed a lightsaber that originally included a crystal that produced a green blade.

Jolee's lightsaber was first created for Star Wars: Knights of the Old Republic. In-game, it shared the same hilt as Revan's Sith lightsaber, as did every other. In The Old Republic, it was obtainable on Rakata (this is no longer available in-game).
